Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Parkside
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin,Washington,Central,and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Parkside.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin,Washington,Central,and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Parkside.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
